short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension is for private use only.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DIRO is the first open banking platform with global coverage. With user consent, we are powering the financial industry with real-time verifications from bank, utility, and government sources.
